title: umbre, ombre, terre dombre
description: 65r uses all these different terms, which is very interesting. We would need to know more about these different terms how they are used throughout the manuscript, how they are defined in Cotgrave and the DMF. Check also Thompson on umbers.

replies.body:
See article by Marika Spring on black and grey earths: "
'Black Earths': A Study of Unusual Black and Dark Grey Pigments used by Artists in the Sixteenth Century" http://www.jstor.org/stable/42616306?seq=1#page_scan_tab_contents
